3.0.name: wordpress/mybloglog-recent-reader-widget
3.0.description: Let the world know who's visiting your blog and learn more about your readers as well. With this widget you'll get a public photo lineup of who's been reading your blog and, after claiming your blog on http://www.mybloglog.com a private stats page showing recent activity.
